channel.title: ArchLord
channel.description:
EDIT: Hmm, I didn't realise the game wasn't in beta anymore, and it doesn't seem to be free :( I had it from ages ago when it was beta. Hey,
Archlord is a free 3d mmorpg. It's basically a Lineage 2 rip-off.. But yeah it's free and it's sorta fun. Just started running around right now, but you can find the features and the free download on the website. http://www.archlordgame.com/
[img]http://img48.imageshack.us/img48/2001/archlord200609270359142mm8.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img48.imageshack.us/img48/8540/archlord200609270359222tj1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/9296/alefclient2020060622201io6.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/733/alefclient2020060622201lh2.jpg[/img]

item.title: ArchLord
item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:7, topic:41349”]I read some of the reviews on EB games and some other place that they sell it. ALL the reviews said it was decent graphics but that everything else sucked about its gameplay :P[/quote] Exactly the game looks like its very fun but when you get on its boring more boring than grinding world of warcraft…Dont buy this Game.

Read full topic
